Class AbstractItem

java.lang.Object
AbstractItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Product
public abstract class AbstractItem extends Object
Abstract class representing an item in inventory. Used as a base class for different product types. Demonstrates abstraction and method overriding.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractItem

      public AbstractItem(String name, int quantity, LocalDate expirationDate, String section, boolean perishable)
      Constructor for AbstractItem.
      Parameters:
      name - The product name.
      quantity - Product quantity.
      expirationDate - Expiration date if perishable.
      section - Store section where product belongs.
      perishable - True if the product is perishable.

    • isExpired

      public boolean isExpired()
      Checks if item is expired. Only works for perishable items.
      Returns:
      True if expired, false otherwise.

    • getItemType

      public abstract String getItemType()
      Abstract method to get item type. Implemented by subclasses.
      Returns:
      The type of item.
